text: The beautiful young woman laughed so much after bathing on the seashore that, as laughter is the greatest provocation of curiosity, she pulled out her head a little to see what was going on. - A shrew! -She cried out, but the quiet, smiling tritone serenaded her with the most unexpected question: FIN
title: Aparición del tritón
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
